meta.job_title: NA Commercial Ops Technical Prod Owner

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with senior leadership to identify opportunities and technology solutions, develop business cases, and gain alignment for technology investment and project decisions.
Drive the technology strategy, roadmap, and execution in the end-to-end commercial space where Supply Chain, Sales Ops, and eCommerce intersect.
Lead product teams to deliver related services and own and drive delivery of a product roadmap to focus on business needs.
Develop talent that can lead the successful delivery of modern approaches to build capabilities for a competitive advantage.
Integrate with project and product teams, represent Commercial priorities, and identify opportunities to improve current processes using automation technologies.
Partner with the wider IT community to ensure all aspects of technology needs are considered in the selection and integration of new technologies.
Maintain a strong understanding of technical architecture and challenge engineering teams to deliver against defined goals.
Lead meetings with senior members of business organizations and hire/develop technology experts to drive agreed business outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Technology, Engineering, Information Architecture, Computer Science, or similar field experience (Master's preferred)
